doctor.name: Dr. Md. Shahjahan Siddike Shakil
doctor.workplace: Dhaka Medical College & Hospital
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Shahjahan Siddike (Shakil) is a highly qualified Chest Diseases & Respiratory Medicine Specialist in Dhaka. He holds an MBBS from Dhaka Medical College (DMC), BCS (Health), MD in Chest Diseases, and MACP (USA). Currently serving as a Consultant at Dhaka Medical College & Hospital, he specializes in the diagnosis and treatment of respiratory conditions, including asthma, COPD, lung infections, and other chest diseases. For consultations, Dr. Md. Shahjahan Siddike is available at Medinova Medical Services, Malibagh, located at Gemcon Business Tower, 255 New Circular Road, Malibagh, Dhaka. His visiting hours are 8:00 PM to 9:30 PM on Sundays, Tuesdays, and Thursdays.

chamber.address: Gemcon Business Tower, 255 New Circular Road, Malibagh, Dhaka

doctor.name: Dr. Adnan Yusuf Choudhury
doctor.specialty: Chest Diseases, Asthma & Respiratory Medicine Specialist
doctor.workplace: Dhaka Medical College & Hospital
doctor.info: Dr. Adnan Yusuf Choudhury is a highly experienced Chest Diseases, Asthma & Respiratory Medicine Specialist, dedicated to diagnosing and treating a wide range of lung and respiratory conditions. He holds an MBBS degree, is a Fellow of the College of Physicians and Surgeons (FCPS) in Medicine, and has an MD in Chest Diseases. As the Associate Professor & Head of Respiratory Medicine at Dhaka Medical College & Hospital, he specializes in managing conditions such as asthma, chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD), pneumonia, tuberculosis (TB), lung fibrosis, sleep apnea, and other respiratory infections. His expertise extends to bronchoscopic procedures and advanced pulmonary care, ensuring patients receive the latest and most effective treatments for their conditions.
